# Entourage (Feat)
## Overview
Your charismatic nature allows you lead nations of men.

**Prerequisites:** Cha 17+, [[Leadership (Feat)|Leadership]].

**Benefit:** You may take the [[Leadership (Feat)|Leadership]] feat as often as you like, stacking its benefits each time. You may have multiple cohorts as a result of this feat. 

**Source:** Feats (AEG), pg. 35
